content: woke up a while ago... i only had like 5 hours so sleep... but iva responded and i feel so much better, i guess it was the fear of abandonment oh welp happens and it is what it is and others, today may be interesting, anvil playtest starts so i wanna see how many will join, not big fan of anvil but i'll play it, gonna make some dinner soo AND also forggoten halls in hsr gotta try

Woke up so I'm gonna yap a bit.
First i need to change the way the posts work, the blog.json is getting too big so I'm prolly gonna switch ways to something... idk
Second i find it funny how my brain will serve me those horrible memories just to make me sad, but I'm only stressing about the future, what will happen, cuz past is well in the past and nothing will change it, I can only improve and learn from it.
Third, bro came back around 1am told me few stories, good for him
Fourth... idk sigma or something funny i don't funking know its 4am loooololol

>open vscode
>look at htdocs root folder
>remember the javascript framework rewrite
>remember that's javascript
>forget
>continue to use php and html 
many such cases

time to do a daily recap!!! WHOOO
this maybe the worst day of the week solely cuz i felt so bad, at the morning i wasn't feeling ok, didn't even wanted to play anything same feeling trough the afternoon only for the evening to get super stressed out of nowhere, i was miserable so i tried to jump into a bed and just rot... i put avicii's stories cd... and my radio refused to open with the cd in... fun... when on the doom walk and sat under the same tree just watched orion, also i dmed iva at that time, i assume she busy so i wont bother her with more, just a simple question if i can talk with her... i would have ask brie but last time i ruined a day for her and robi is clearly still upset since he banned me on his twitch so... went on a walk outside the town and did 8k steps, came back home played some gmod with the tards and now im just sitting waiting for bro to come back from his new gf... fuck me idk how can he do this cuz for me it would be impossible but i guess we build different, ALSO FUCK DAYLIGHT SAVING!!!

tbh it felt i sat under the same tree in the park in the other side of the town and i was just watching starts, it was cloudy when i left but when i got there the sky clear perfectly for orion watching...
back from my walk, i need a name for it fr. 8000 steps and i ponder trough dark streets outside the town, i send iva a dm, but she hasn't responded, she prolly busy soooooo i'll wait maybe tomorrow

I'm just laying in bed and listening to avicii's stories album  snd i hear echoes of a thousand screams as i lay me down to sleep theres a black hole deep inside of me reminding me that I lost my backbone somewhere in stockholm i lost my backbone somewhere in stockholm... damm I love avicii... gone too soon...
i changed into pjs... not really even feeling like i wanna shower... just kinda miserable rn, but i feel less so stressed so, gonna watch manlybadasshero my goat

and now i remember when covid stared and i had something like this too, but pen and paper so i couldnt read what i write lmfao, this is kinda convenient cuz i can at least read it and post from my phone if im on the move

damm i started thinking of how edgy i was back in the day like i remembered the liveleaks i saw or 8kun shit was crazy edgey but luckly im over this for a good few years now... it aint fun but i still sometimes see the fucking mass murder videos but this time some tard put the video over minion ai and minionfiet it... like holy fuck there are still kids out there who find it funny... like shlong... if i ever see anyone post shit im just gonna called them 14 cuz aint now way your an adult

and im home alone... i prolly gonna go to bed and rot... this stress is so fucking annoying but i somehoe need to get ahead of it, stress leads to panic, panic lead to irritational thinking, irritational thinking to bad decisions... i hate it... if i were to rank the week so far today and wednesday were the worst with friday and saturday best... fuckkk me

so far the day is progressing slowly
played civ but the desync killed the game for us after that we played some baro and now im just idk stressing and tbh.... AHHH the stress is killing me idk whyyyyy AAAAAAAAAA...
i can see why webdevs are missable cuz wtf is javascript like this shit looks painful. i would fit right in lmfao
feeling tad stressed, played some barotrauma and we got mad at eachother, apparently stealing from the outpost is bad or something, also daylight saving happened that's why it felt so weird
woke up just now... going to sleep at 4.30 aint my thing.
omg i forgot bout the eclipse it was so uneventful cuz of the clouds that i completely forgot but yea it happened

spoke enough english to switch back, weird it is that if i speak english my thoughts are in english but after speaking polish i switch to polish,
it's recap time,  this fucking meme is so old lol
today was interesting cuz meeting a old friend wasn't something i expected, i just know that most of them are busy so i was lucky to run into him, we talk for an hour straight bout most random topics nice, cleaned the basement from big trash like old chairs broken electronic and other garbage, and went cycling cuz i got sad but i managed to explain to myself that there's no reason to be upset bout the past i can't change it and i'm looking forward to the future... it might be dark but i don't know rn if it really will be soooo, done laundry, made a pizza. also played cs with jasper and marc and the gand, later some barotrauma with vlad and the gane, and after that gmod horror maps with kal, aggro, scott, alex and david. the backroom maps was kinda scary so i'm prolly gonna clip some. OH also done 15km on bike before i met buda so... i wanted to get started with some javascript frame work but i always have time tomorrow... i'm lost intrest in bluesky ngl it was fun but it wasn't for me i guess, now i just wanna know how's everyone i met there doing... but it's prolly safe to assume they're happy. the idea of asking even iva if i can come back is putting me in so much stress... THE IDEA ITSELF FUCKKK, now simon imagine actually going and trying fuck... it's late so im prolly gonna head to bed soon and watch so manlybadasshero my goat

dobra po prysznicu się i se zdałem sprawę że nie ma co płakać nad rozlanym mlekiem, to co sie stało stało sie, to co sie stanie stanie się, proste i logiczne, nie wiem czemu jestem smutny z powodu przeszłości ale nie mam po co... bo to przeszłość i tyle nie zmienie jej, się nagadałem z budą i teraz po polsku gadam lol, no to tyle chyba nic nie zmienię i tyle muszę z tym żyć i tyle, gówniane troche
kurwa, ale fajne, sie cieszę w chuj że go spotkałem, kurde... teraz se siędzę w domu, zrobiłem ciasto na pizze i zaraz sie umyję

NIE WIERZĘ! spotkałem bude, zbyt zajęty by sie spotkać, robota w tygodniu, studia w poznaniu w weekend, ale zajebiście, jechał na rower a ja wracałem z rower, ale się nagadaliśmy on ma obsesje na punkce słupuw elektrycznych no ale elektrykiem to co sie dziwić ja mam na punkcie serverów, zrobił prawo jazdy na tiry... zerwał z agnieszką, nie wierzę,no ale miała romans za jego plecami... A POTEM DRUGI... no to co się dziwić... Naopowiadał jak robi w stacja elektryczny zajebista robota nie będe kłamał. Powiedział jak tam żyją wszysty jak tam u Mielony, Konradka, Menia... kurde ale fajnie się gadało

Got a tad sad our of nowhere and now I'm out cycling amazing view of the water point, rn I'm heading back home and buy a monster... I have no idea what to think right now. One side I wanna come and say that I'm sorry what my wrongdoings but at the same the I feel like there's no point... FUCKKKK I have no idea. I have no clue. Fuck simon you really really fall off, tbh I feel so shit cuz it was cuz of me I cause it. I went through hell in life. From uncle saying he will murder us in our sleep to dad almost killing himself yet I haven't feel this bad. I tried and helped everyone beside my mom and I haven't felt this bad, I felt drained and exhausted it was a wild, but this time I am the cause and that's prolly why I feel so funking bad, after trying everything to help everyone now I only managed to hurt... it funking sucks like it hadn't before

i woke up just in time for eclipse like 10 min before and still it was cloudy... i just watched a livestream of it... cool. after that went shopping bought some food dinner and played cs with tards full 5 queue a guy called me a kid LMFAOOO (i was throwing hard) so i just called him unc and now im cleaning the basement from all of the garbage

AHH FUCK i woke up for the eclips and would you know it was cloudy... fuck me i went to sleep... and i had a dream where i was living in luxury apartment with the quintessential quintuplets grils, one day random gifts appeared around the house so we opned them and somehow my cousin came and claimed a bar like full bar, and i got a massive soldering iron, but after that we tried to make a music band only for our house to get haunted by five nights at freddies animatronics and they only chased me, and when the hunt was over i came to one of the rooms only to place Minecraft blocks, bookshelf and alchemist table... AM I THE ONLY ONE WHO GETS DREAMS LIKE THIS???? LIKE alex came to me saying tthat he had a dream where i was running around  my apartment complex with a stick and it was in the middle of the forest and i was like this shit so normal...

I usually won't be typing this late but what happened was amazing and i really don't wanna miss the details, so. Me kal and Alex went play foxhole but new war started bur new war started so nothing interesting was happening so we took bikecycles and drover around the map while going over our history the friend grupe, Alex told us how 68th was formed how hito was a charismatic leader but not a good one, how Alex got recruited and the split to able and Charlie, complaing about DIG i tried to tell how me and Scott met and kali told us how his old friend grupe collapsed, after that Vladimir, feather and Scott joined, we got them bikes and continued to cycle feather and clad agreed with Alex's stores and Scott told story of how he met me Marcus, Mark,David,jasper and how we all played on engi idle and after the server closed we moved to jailbreak only for Scott and jasper getting banned so we moved to foxhole and there we met 68th and we just kinda ducked with each other and just become friends with all, kali tho was brought by Scott from intruder, we went down a memory lane watched only old video we have and saw my screenshots they go as far back as 2017 so it was kinda crazy, I feel so happy that 6 of us just talked about past and how we met and what we were at the same time cycling thought the enter map in foxhole... today was amazing i am so fucking happy

went on a doomer walk (need to get better name scott's one sucks) and went to a gas station got a premade burger and improved it home it was decent and i had a redbull on the walk so i prolly just rot in bed... now im having a beer, second this week so not bad and watching tards play war thunder... if they add subs i will play war thunder... also on the walk i sat under a tree in a park, i found a dark area, and watched the starts with my binos... man...

something inside of me is screaming make a pirate radio station and i wonder in how big of trouble will i get into if i do broadcast in regulated frequencies, listining to radio garden is prolly the reason lolololo

my grandpa called me! suprising since it usually me who calls her. it was about the dog, vet took of her stiches are everything is good, no problems good, im happy! now poor thing has massive scar going all her body length, it doesn't even know that she was bout to die due to cancer stupid dog, she kinda just silly now, also that she got vaccinated so here's that, also we all got our anvil keys so we can play the next play test in full squad it's gonna be intresting going from like 4 to 10 people ngl this day is going well so far, well beside me not being able to find my eclipse glasses but prolly got thrown out... i though had them somewhere but nope and there's no way i'll find any anytime soon and me looking like a tomato again lol
back home... done 24km on bike. gonna shower and prolly play few games with friends

Ahhh sitting under a bridge 7km away from home, ngl I'm having a mixed feeling rn, kinda sad and kinda happy, sad cuz I feel like I've here before in a situation like this with Scott and jasper... and happy cuz of the moment and the idea that it worked out well with them... also I'm getting sunburned lmfao the sun is balsting rn so. Maybe also also I'll ask brie how to do skin care cuz I'm almost out of my cream and spray thingy, but that's after I'm manage to regain her trust and fix what I funked up... ahhh this shit sucks..
i cant my brother asked me to lend him my phone so he can ask chatgpt to do his homework... bro... we all are soooo cooked

i always wonder why yvand's or since he transition shima always has those weird discord statuses cuz like... "if the pain go away idk if i make it" like girl... you had satuses like this for what feel like year and i know her for like 3 years
woke up a while ago and i cannot get over this feeling of sadness idk why...
i broke my a connector in my mouse while trying to fix it and i superglue it lmfao let's see how long it will work

time to daily daily recap!
feeling much better today, i'm relatively happy that i managed to make the ai disocrd bot a tad better, i'm also slowly trying to use venv and .env more as a good practice but im kinda surprised how well it went,
the gaming was mad fun slopdrivers were fun we had a good laugh and even got few funny clips, talks were fun too,
the doomer walk was short only 4000 steps but i done a astro pic it came out good enough, even tried a new stacking software and it was pain i couldn't do shit and the image came out green... maybe when i get like a real camera with real lens i could use that software but rn i'll stick with sequator and gimp
i saw robi's tweet i wonder if it's just hi typical doomposting or something happened... my man i worry bout him... i kinda wanna ask if he good but i know he doesn't want to see me so... TBH i would love to ask everyone how are they but like no (even tho it's driving me crazy...)
fuck me and my fucked up skibidy life i guess
on the other note my s key is dying actively and my right mouse button too... S just sometimes doesn't register and my right click is sometime unpress when hold... annoying i hope i can clean the contacts and it'll be ok cuz i really dont wanna soder...

it was fun the helldivers with squad i had a blast, we farmed few supercredits so alex can finally get a his warbound and got few funny clips, now i'm gonna break... gonna do my walk... we talked about dumbest things ever... fnaf, game theory, shitty battlefield, ai, foxhole, slop, my situation and minectaft movie... chicken jockey!!! damm the minecraft movie is gonna be such a slopfest i need to see it... but now i wanna do my doom walk... so far today is one of the better days this week... and i was suppose to meet with the therapists but like nope, cuz fuck you simon that's why... hope she gets better soon...

ok i figured a way so i can run an ollama on my pc and my discord bot can communicate using an api with my pc, in short i made it so the bot.py runnining on my home server using post sends a message and and after that it get the respond sending it, i had to make an environment variable for ollama so it listens to all ip... make a firewall exception and it's still not perfect since i have to start the ollama server on my pc manually!!! UNACCAPTABLE. plan going forward is to get a python script that runs on startup of windows and listens to bot.py reqests so it can start, post, get and shutdown the date from ollama while i have to do nothing... get to it... or not idk me whatever rn cuz im kinda tired after... IT WORKS THO
omg i found a model that RUNS on the server, is it good. NO, but does it run YES nice

addinolly i wonder what's scott is up to cuz like my guy hasn't been in vc for a while now i really wonder and also also my broke with his gf??? AND FOUND A NEW ONE??! LIKE HOWW how does he do it ?!?!? when i asked why he just said he had enough of her constant nagging him but like... you were with her for like 3-4 years now??? LIKE HOOOW BROO HOW, i kinda wish i was like him not caring in the slightest like nope doesnt fucking matter, instead im this weirdo who wants to make everyone happy and fails horribly lmao, i wonder tho cuz they were together for so long... kinda wish i had a clingy gf but at this point idc it's not like it will ever happened

ok daily report coming right in
i had the maybe the worst days this week like top 3 and it's just the 3rd day omg... in order, played some cs with jasper david and kal, somehow carried even tho i was trolling??? then i had the dentist visit... and somehow from two teeth needed fixing it became 3??? like what??? in the span of 3 weeks really one just needs fixing??????... she tor trough the tooth and fix one... and like destroyed one of the small veins so it has been bleeding for a while and it hurts... fuck this, after that i finally checked my phone and i cant... the therapist left a message saying she's sick and moving my visit... like no matter how much i try the fate thinks i should just suffer i hope it's soon... this distancing isn't working for me, i hope it's working for brie and robi... i really wonder how's everyone, how's brie thesis... how's robi's job... how's iva's uni... but i must wait... i hate it... i suffer, but it isn't the first time and prolly wont be last... i really wanna show the ai discord bot cuz it could be mad fun imo, like thinking pikol?! LIKE HOW COOL IS THAT? but first i would need to fine tune a model a small model preferably for that purpose of roleplaying, and like is this what depression is... i should prolly know i had therapy almost most of my teen and adult time... but i hadn't felt it in so long that i lost the feeling of it, this weird feeling of incoming doom, hopeless feeling, like nothing matters and like you're life isn't in your controll... weird af ngl cuz i know it's not true but i still feel it and it fucking sucks
i need to go for a walk... my fate wants me to suffer...
i manage to drive an ai model into madness
I can't the therapist got sick... and cancelled my visit... I'm gonna kill myself, even when I try fate wants me gone... you can't make this shit up

i think i need to find a open source ai model and finetune it but... i never done that... and i would somehow have to half the size of llama to 500mil fomr 1bilion shit, also i came back from the dentist 2 more visits but in may so... i really wanna test the ai pikol but i dont have anyone right now... i wish maybe this friday after the vist but my hopes are low...
yep it works fine on the optiplex... i wonder if i can offload the processing power to my main pc so it works when it's online cuz the small homeserver is sufferign when i start it lmfao
i crashed my server again lmfao even the smallest model is able to lag the server this badly, i'll try on my dell optiplex

i just saw the new michael reeves video when he uses chatgpt to lowball peeps on fb marketplace and im just sitting here wondering why openai??? why chat gpt???? thier api aint free so he paied for the use... like... it's 0.05€ per request i assume so like... just use open source models... deepseek, llama idk there's like 100s of those now, also kinda funny how i am trying to do simular thing without the gaslighting and lowballing but for fun
i found this cool chrome extension so i can us dicord's rich presence for web apps, fuck yea

Bored af rn so might swell type some shit
Came back from my doomer flicker something walk not that much today just 5k steps, i had no clue but there's like a yoga class happening in the gym??? lot's of grannies soooo. took a shower and now just i just kinda exist. the feeling yesterday was so fucking shit like on god... but it was justified, i had done some horrible shit to folks i love, it was a mix of feeling like a failure cuz no man should ever make a girl sad, mixed with feeling like the end is near, the idea of exposing the bad and the ugly infront of everyone is very... suffocating... i wish i only shown the good but noone is like this, everyone has the bad and the ugly. i hope the therapist can explain it to me more, but i feel right now that it wont,that i should just abandon all hope, fuck... oh well... i fucked up and i need to get better. and that was topped with me fears... it got combined into this shit feeling but i managed to explain it to myself so i feel better... my situation hasn't changed, but i feel better today.
also today the high presser hose came and ngl it's fun having a compressor i dusted my pc COVERRING EVERYTHING IN THE BASMENT WITH DUST LMFAOO and it doesnt help that the breaker pops when using plugs so i have to use this janky light bulb e27 to normal socket it feels so wrong drawing 1100 watts trough that but whatever if it's starts smoking maybe i will die lmao, it's also got super sketchy cuz the light bulb broke so i had to somehow get the small tungsten rod connected INSIDE THE LIGHTBULB but i managed to shake it a bit and get it so the tungsten makes contact nice (also it's so fun seeing how the light go dim when i plug the compresso into the normal wall outlet),
tomorrow is the dentist visit at 5 i have two teeth to fix so maybe i'll get one done i hope and other then that idk not much happened

tldr i made a simple proof of concept for the discord roleplaying bot, doom walked, dusted the pc and that's it? i think

partial success i managed to make a discord bot that is capable of roleplaying! it worked fine with facebook' llmao3.2:1b modle YAYAYAY, i tried a lot of small models but only llama3.2 with 1 billion parameters worked fine other smaller models are not capable of roleplaying! but now i wonder if even this small model will work on my small homeserver 2gb of ram with 2 cores of 2015~... and even if it does will it take too much resources so my other services such as my website will run good... well i need to do some live testing, but now im gonna go on my flicker doom walk, i feel better today tho not feeling that overwhelming feeling of dearth.
other then that i haven't done much but im amazed it worked fine on my pc sooooo tomorrow i'll try to get it on my server and test more models with hopes of finding smaller model witch can roleplay
i crashed my server

OMG i have a stroke of an idea WHAT IF i ME I me MAKE a discord bot that can use open ai models and communicate like a well idk whatever i make it to be, i wonder if i can do it using the open source shit like deepseek or llama i obv have to use my big rig pc for that but if i manage i'll use smaler parementer models on my medium server i wonder if ollama works well with that
FUCK MEEEEEE I went to look outside hoping to see some starts only to be met with a dens fog... cant have shit in poland not even starts

Woke up... so might aswell type some more... today we also play some foxhole and i repiad what idid yesterday to Marcus we went and killed an Russian train we stole it under their very nose my man had a good laugh and was very happy good for him :D, aswell as a gmod situation... me and aggro got into argument with Scott and kali... we did a base raid / defence but 500lb bomb just destroyed all of the props... we argued saying that is there a difference when I walk into the base I die when I don't I die even when I disarm a trap by dying it appears seconds after... it was pointless but heated even got kal to drop few nukes... I said it's whatever but the German got too upset and left. Like why tf all the Germans I know take everything too seriously like bro chill tf out.
Also I now know why I feel like shit it hit me like a train, no matter what it hit me good since I had done some doomer shit... oh well... the cemetery is really scary after drak hehehe will go there again this time I'll leave a prayer to my uncle, miss you even tho you hated my red hair you still made my childhood fun.
I'll try to falle asleep... maybe I'll ponder upon the starts a bit

im gonna go sleep early... i have this weird feeling of stress in my that's at this point gets really annoying and mostly cuz i cannot pin point why i am feeling it. like i feel weak and gloomy but like why???? it's just annoying me rn this shitting feeling like... why??? why tho???

came back from my doom walk 11000 steps and i did a circle around the town and also got my shoes muddy in the park and and went to the cemetery scary place ngl and that's mostly all kinda feeling better still struggling and the worst part is idk why i cant really pin point why
im gonna do what scott calls a flicker doom walk but it's kinda early for it so just like idk walk

so far nothing interesting happened i bought an compressor air gun and ordered pressure hose so hopeful tomorrow i can use it, i popped a breaker in the basement again but surprisingly if i use the light bulb threat seems stupid to draw around 1000 watts trought that but who cares lmfao if a fire starts maybe it'll cook my neighbors fuck them. also i have a dentist visit and a therapy vist this week... im not looking for both of them 
im struggling but i have to persist

a stroke of idea but what if like only what if i make funny a grid so the funnies display as a grid like a subpage to a page it could work... also i really wanna rewrite this page into some js framwork but idk what
to be fair this is my drunk fantasy, but... who's gonna say i shouldn't drink... fuck...

OH YEA also my super fast meal today like on god i spend like 20 mins and only cuz my carrots somehow got frozent in the fridge like how??!?!?.
but i make super simple gravy??? idk what to call it in english but i fried onions with carrots added some tomato saouce and some bagged spices and ngl it came out well... sadly my pyzy were frozen so to microwave they went... 20 min... but i managed to did all foood and clean up

also the situation in foxhole got crazy not the tanking but me and vlad got accused of DESTROYING TANKS??? and poor marcus got very worried, told him to redirect the guy to me since im the problem apperently, and he was polish so it went smooth... but still... we grab cutlers to destory craned battle tank... and my boy marcus got tangled into things he shouldn't clearly got worried too much... SO MARCUS MADE A GC WITH THE GUY god and he invaited alll of us and the guy 8 to 2 like on god the gc was so fucking retared like my fucking god but in the end i told the guy that if i was to destroy i wouldn't even leave a name and if i was to destory i wouldn't have enough rpgs and i would get weapon locked and my activity log is clear cuz i only partisant so like i have nothing... he gave up so it's all good but... poor marcus it lives rent free in his head

sunday ah a day
we watched girls und panzers das finale 3 and 4 and ngl the finale 4 was one of the better animated anime movies i saw the action is just crazy
and cuz of that we palyed foxhole 8 of us! it was blast but then we lost one out of four tanks cuz peeps left and after that we died cuz we got caough in a pickle and got surrunded losing anoter tank, after that we just kinda gave up dropped the tanks went to eat cuz most of us havent and watched transformers and omg the movie sucks ass, product placment with pentagon propaganda... fuck yea i love the military... and worth mention weird amount of cockholdery... like wtf... *can i at least watch*...LIKE DAWG WTFFF ARE YOU ON????
i opened up to vlad and alex about the situation... they said i fucked up by dropping a truth nuke... and for them it looks like it affects me more... telling me to choose if im willing to stick or i should just cut it... AND i should talk to my supersoilders (god i love alex my man) but one of my supersoilders is very mad at me for ignoring his advice and i really dont wanna bother the other in case i make the same mistake... i really wanna stay

another day another me
feeling relatively sad right now just kinda existing for no other sake then just existing...
the day normal, haven't moved much and that may be the reason why im kinda sad... played some helldivers and foxhole so also the ddss or the office game and gmod had good laugh
dad and i bought an air compressor AND IT BLOWS THE BREAK IN THE BASEMENT LMFAO IT'S SO FUNNY, we prolly have to use it in house or garage, we got it cheap but good, used one without hoses and attachments and one of the plastics wheel missing but it works fine so
finished The NOexistenceN of you AND me... fuck me kinda horrible... we used people to fuel ourself... we put a preferments on a stage so others see us as what we want them to... using mask to switch what we are to other... fuck man that kinda fucking sucks... especially after all that happened... i felt like shit.... at least the anime girl was amazing and the artstyle is like no other... should i give up...

had first beer in a 2 weeks ngl i missed it it was very nice, nice lmao.
i made the pizza first time in like 3 weeks... it was great i loved it and now i juts sit... played few games talked a bit after coming back, oiled my hair chamage into pj... now... i wish i could talk with someone... it's getting boring... i wonder if anyone is reading those... i wont even be mad. oh welp. i fucked up, as you sow, so shall you reap... or somethiong like this
day is going strong, played some helldivers talk a bit cycled and did 24km and preping some pizza tonight mhmhhhhmmm, now just need to shower and im ready to play few games

as per usual nothing interesting happened
i bought a new game a vn and ngl is quite interesting one got it cuz of artstyle and the game is more intresting then expacted 
also did some cycling 11km to be exact and at the end did some astrophotograpy soooo. im so glad i got into habit of putting a high vis jacket cuz the cops stopped and looked at me funny when driving i fr thought they will stop me, and like mostly all
played few games destoryed 3 trains in foxhole played the office among us game and gmod so i had fun today

i got back from the therapist, 28th is the date, nice nice.
now to fun... a new clothing store open in town and who would guess they have mostly girl clothing and not many man choices. very fun very nice,
and spend a lot playing foxhole today, i wanted to play terraria but i felt like doing something else, so foxhole it was, and we killed a rsc, first try we me and marcus got qrf and the fucking russian regi laughed at us, so i got mad af and gather more people, we got chieftains 2 of them and we arrived back only to see them in tanks ready to fught back like... i got chased by 3 spathas amd scott by a talos like wtf, we both died but we were only scounting ahead so the shieftains surivied so we came back again with like a psyop idea friends pushed with jeeps to lure the tanks out and we came in with shieftains to destory it and so we did, it was mad crazy idea cuz we even got random ahh items in jeeps so they will stop and laugh at them... it worked lmfao they goot good and when i came back to check on them they are fixing the wrong side of the  defenses so we're coming back if they make one again
